{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Thomson |model=TWG870 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/30/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=PKE938B-D49 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem, wireless router |fcc_id=H8NPKE938 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QG-HCF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43224 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115;BCM53115SKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Cable Modem LNA;Broadcom;BCM3410;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=28:BE:9B |oui=80:C6:AB }} '''Technicolor/Thomson Euro/DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless and VoIP Cable Gateway''' *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/technicolor-thomson-twg870-docsis-eurodocsis-30-875 ''TWG870'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] • The TWG870 is a VoIP wireless cable router with four 10/100/1000Base-T LAN ports, :one USB port and a two FXS ports for VoIP. It is DOCSIS / EuroDOCSIS 3.0 compliant :and provides WAN throughput of up to 440Mbps. • The integrated access point complies with IEEE 802.11n (draft) standard, providing wireless :transmission speeds of up to 100Mbps. It supports WEP and WPA/WPA2 wireless encryption :and 802.1x authentication. A WPS button allows for easy wireless security configuration. • The TWG870 supports a variety of VoIP features, such as Caller ID, 3-way conferencing and echo. :A built-in SPI firewall protects the network against hackers and Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. ===Serial/JTAG=== ====Pinouts==== Serial is '''J305''' (115200 8N1): 
 _________________
| VCC GND  RX TX  |
